publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2929 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Baird Trust Reorganisation Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, for the Baird Trust Reorganisation Bill, Consideration Stage shall not take place and, accordingly, agrees that, for the purposes of the Bill, Rules 9A.7.1(b), 9A.9 and the first sentence of 9A.8.10 of the Standing Orders be suspended. Supported by: Tavish Scott*
